name: ListReceipts
description:
Retrieve a list of all receipts.

Call this tool to obtain a list of all receipts. Useful for fetching detailed receipt information.

parameters.name: filter_created_after_date
parameters.description: Filter receipts created after this date in ISO8601 format.

value_schema.description: Filter receipts created after this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: filter_created_before_date
parameters.description: Filter receipts created before this date in ISO8601 format.

value_schema.description: Filter receipts created before this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: specific_transaction_id
parameters.description: Filter receipts for a specific transaction using its ID.

value_schema.description: Filter receipts for a specific transaction.

parameters.name: filter_from_date
parameters.description: Filter receipts; only include transactions with 'user_transaction_time' after this date (ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter receipts for transactions with a `user_transaction_time` after this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: filter_transactions_before_date
parameters.description: Filter receipts for transactions with a `user_transaction_time` before this date (ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter receipts for transactions with a `user_transaction_time` before this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: pagination_start_id
parameters.description: The ID of the last receipt from the previous page for pagination.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page, between 2 and 100. Defaults to 20 if unspecified.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Filter receipts created after this date (ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter receipts created after this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Filter receipts created before this date (ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter receipts created before this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: Filter receipts for a specific transaction.

value_schema.description: Filter receipts for a specific transaction.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Filter receipts for transactions with a `user_transaction_time` after this date (ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter receipts for transactions with a `user_transaction_time` after this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Filter receipts for transactions with a `user_transaction_time` before this date (ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter receipts for transactions with a `user_transaction_time` before this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
